items.sentence: I promised Tom I wouldn't stay in Australia for more than three days.
I just heard Tom and Mary are coming back to Australia for Christmas.
Everybody thought that Tom was going to be in Australia this weekend.
Does Tom still think that Mary would like to go to Australia with us?
Tom thought Mary was in Australia, but she was really in New Zealand.
Tom told me he thought Mary still wanted to go to Australia with him.
Are you sure it was Tom you spoke to? Could it have been his brother?
He is a busy man, so you can only get in touch with him by telephone.
I got the impression Tom wasn't happy with the way things turned out.
Tom says he usually has at least three hundred dollars in his wallet.
Tom's legs were seriously injured, but he managed to crawl to safety.
Tom opened the envelope, took out the letter, and started to read it.
I don't think that I can get you to understand how difficult that is.
Questioned about his policies, the candidate gave only vague answers.
I left home later than usual, but I was still able to catch my train.
Tom realized he didn't have enough money to buy everything he wanted.
Tom realized he didn't have enough time to do what needed to be done.
Stay as far away as possible from anybody that you think may be sick.
I don't think Tom knows what time I'm going to arrive at the station.
I don't think it's very likely Tom will come over this time of night.
I don't think you need to tell Tom why you went Australia last month.
I don't think that I need to tell Tom that Mary wants him to do that.
I don't think that I could stand to spend three hours alone with Tom.
I suspect Tom and Mary know something interesting is about to happen.
I suspect Tom and Mary were surprised when John walked into the room.
Tom told me that he thought that I might be interested in doing that.
Tom wanted Mary to do that, but she told him that she wouldn't do it.
Tom didn't seem surprised when Mary told him that she had to do that.
Maybe Tom should consider the possibility Mary has left him for good.
There's a possibility that Tom won't want to go to Australia with us.
Tom told me he thought that Mary would be present at today's meeting.
The Greeks landed on the Italian peninsula in the eighth century B.C.
Tom asked me how I kept from getting nervous in front of an audience.
Tom wanted to stay single, but his parents wanted him to get married.
We lay in the grass holding hands and watched the clouds floating by.
Tom said that he had some things that he needed to get off his chest.
The pirates lost their patience with Tom and made him walk the plank.
Tell me one reason why I should trust Tom after what he's done to me.
We waited half an hour at the library for Tom, but he didn't turn up.
If you don't get out of my store, I'm going to have to call the cops.
There are a lot of things that have changed since you were last here.
I've always wanted to play a church organ and pull out all the stops.
I met a man yesterday that I didn't know, but he knew a lot about me.
I admit that I was hesitant to speak to you the first time I saw you.
That wasn't the first time I'd met Tom. I'd met him somewhere before.
How much time does it usually take you to get dressed in the morning?
It probably wouldn't have been that difficult to do that by yourself.
Tom soon discovered that he knew more about science than his teacher.
By the time I was your age, I'd already been working for three years.
Kindness is a language which the blind can see and the deaf can hear.
